doc:
Linus Roache https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linus_Roache 0 Linus William Roache (born 1 February 1964) is an English actor. He is known for playing Executive ADA Michael Cutter in the NBC dramas Law Order (2008–10) and Law Order: Special Victims Unit (2011–12). He was nominated for a Golden Globe Award for playing Robert F. Kennedy in RFK (2002) and won a Satellite Award for Best Supporting Actor (TV) for his role as Ralph Wigram in The Gathering Storm (2002). His other television roles include King Ecbert in the History Channel series Vikings (2014–17). His film appearances include Priest (1994), The Wings of the Dove (1997), Pandaemonium (2000), Batman Begins (2005) and Non-Stop (2014). Linus_William_Roache ( born 1_February_1964 ) is an_English_actor . He is_known for playing_Executive_ADA_Michael_Cutter in the_NBC_dramas_Law_(_2008 – 10_)_and_Law_ : Special_Victims Unit_(_2011 – 12_) . He was_nominated for a_Golden_Globe_Award for playing Robert_F._Kennedy in RFK_(_2002_) and won a_Satellite_Award for Best_Supporting_Actor_(_TV_) for his_role as Ralph_Wigram in The_Gathering_Storm_(_2002_) . His_other_television_roles include King_Ecbert in the_History_Channel_series_Vikings (_2014 – 17_) . His_film_appearances include Priest_(_1994_) , The_Wings of the_Dove_(_1997_) , Pandaemonium_(_2000_) , Batman Begins (_2005_) and Non-Stop_(_2014_) .
